attributes.action: make house offers legally binding contracts as per the Scottish system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of people in this country are going through needless heartache because of thoughtless people who make offers on their house only to pull out at the last minute. 

We the undersigned urge the PM to consider bringing house sale legislation into line with the Scottish system where offers are legally binding.
